title: Turkey and Tortilla Soup
ingredients: ['300ml chicken stock', '12 corn tortillas, cut into 1.25cm strips', '1 1/2 (395g) jars enchilada sauce', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '275g cooked turkey, chopped', '250ml single cream', '1 tomato, chopped', '1 Scotch bonnet chilli, seeded and finely chopped', '1 avocado, peeled, pitted and diced', '125g grated mature Cheddar cheese']
